Class MessageLog

java.lang.Object
org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites.message.MessageLog
public class MessageLog extends Object
Gathers Messages during the runtime of the applications.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a MessageLog with the provided MessageSinks.
